content:

title: Gloda "Total" search gone awol - Rebuilt index dont solve the issue
content:
Here is an image explaining the issue I've been suffering from the last two days. Before everything was fine :-(

Any search gives me "strange" results. The worst is when there are at least 25 emails in the folders and no one is found, and the list is empty... ... or if it finds some while the others are lost in the void and you're not aware of that??

Already, I've Rebuilt the index twice... no satisfaction.

I need that feature to work perfectly, otherwise I'm lost !!!!!

( Local folder is populated by at least 25 root folders + a lot of subfolders with many sub-sub-folders )

PS: 2° pic "Agrip" should give a result > I was searching "agrip"'s mails not yet moved in that Sub-Sub-folder
creator: alainch2

title: Ich kann meine E-Mail Konten nicht mehr einsehen. Alle Nachrichten und Ordner sind weg.
content:
ich habe inzwischen ein neues Konto unter meiner E-Mail-Adresse er öffnet und kann dort auch aktuelle E-Mails empfangen. aber meine gesamten Kontakte sind nicht mehr vorhanden, auch die sonstigen gespeicherten E-Mails (gesendete, Entwürfe usw.) sind nicht mehr vorhanden.

Wie komme ich an die Daten, die ja eigentlich im Computer noch vorhanden sein müssten?

Vielen Dank für Ihre Hilfe, Horst W.. Lehmann

title: téměř plné úložiště
content:
Dobrý den, touto cestou bych chtěl zkusit zjistit, jak je možné uvolnit kvótu: domain - quota / STORAGE. Mám zaplněno 95%, což je téměř 20 GB, při takovém využití kapacity začíná zlobit odesílání/ přijímaní pošty s přílohami. Mnoho e-mailu již nemám ve složkách, ani v archivu. Jak by bylo možno uvolnit místo, je to velmi otravné pořád mazat přílohy a podobné, jelikož to na dlouho ani nepomůže.

Děkuji za odpověď.
creator: autoservisjurek

title: Import from Outlook, Thunderbird says "No Profile Found" - I DO have Office and Outlook installed and active.
content: Recent new system. Previously used Office Outlook and backed everything up to a PST file. Found I couldn't import into Thunderbird, needed to install Outlook first and import it there. Did that. So I have an Office 365 Subscription active and have Outlook active. Now I'm trying to get those messages to Thunderbird, but when I go to Import and select Import From Outlook I get a red error "No profile found" and can't continue. Is there something I need to do regarding Outlook for Thunderbird to recognize it?
creator: ajc73

title: Synchronizing webcal subscriptions
content:
Hi,

I'm using Thunderbird 137. Since Thunderbird 128, CalDAV synchronization has been integrated in Thunderbird, through New Calendar > On my network.

When I try to use this setting (writing https://my-nextcloud-instance.com/ in the Location field), I am only able to add to Thunderbird the calendars I've created on my Nextcloud server. But I've also add webcal subscriptions in this Nextcloud server, and these don't show up.

How do I import webcal subscriptions from a CalDAV cloud calendar in Thunderbird? This should be possible since it was possible with TBSync and is possible on Android with DavX⁵.
creator: kant-aristote
